General.Name: Dong Ah Tire & Rubber Co Ltd
General.Description: Dong Ah Tire & Rubber Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of rubber products in Korea and internationally. It offers automobile inner tubes, flaps, curing envelopes, curing and air spring bladders, and CMB compounds, as well as tube valves. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Yangsan, South Korea.
